ComicInfo.Title: The Living Nightmare - Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
A.I.M. makes a final all-out attack to destroy the remaining Avengers resistance! Will Captain America be able to uncover the true source of A.I.M.'s power before it's too late?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Jon Sommariva | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Nil Vendrell | 2 |

ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jon Sommariva, Marcio Fiorito, Nil Vendrell
ComicInfo.Characters: Ant-Man (Lang), Black Panther, Black Widow, Captain America, Carol Danvers, Doctor Strange, Hulk, Iron Man, Kkallakku, Nightmare, Scarlet Witch, Spider-Man, Thor, Vision
